news.title: AI memory is sold out, causing an unprecedented surge in prices
news.summary: Three primary memory vendors — Micron, SK Hynix and Samsung Electronics — make up nearly the entire RAM market. They're benefitting from this shortage.

news.title: Abel's $25 million Berkshire paycheck is in the same league as other S&P 500 CEOs
news.summary: Greg Abel's $25M salary as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO is an enormous jump from Warren Buffett's famously small paycheck. Abel still lags the nation's best paid corporate leaders.

news.title: Mortgage rates drop to lowest level in nearly 3 years as Trump orders buying of $200 billion in mortgage bonds
news.summary: President Donald Trump says he is instructing mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds. Trump posted on social media Thursday that he was instructing the mortgage giants to buy the bonds.

news.title: Trump says oil companies will spend $100 billion in Venezuela with U.S. protection
news.summary: The oil industry has been mostly silent on Venezuela as the security situation and stability of the government in Caracas is far from clear. The oil industry is largely focused on the U.S. market.

news.title: Gen Z just isn’t seen as ‘work-ready’ – here’s why a million young brits are unemployed
news.summary: "You've got a lot of young people who missed out on years of in person education, work experience, work readiness," a charity impact chief said.

news.title: ‘There’s nothing we can do’: The Great Millennial Career Crisis has workers giving up on ever owning homes or paying off their student loans
news.summary: A generation is burned out by the “broken promise” of the American dream. What’s happening with a generation feeling burned out?

news.title: These 8 stocks could form the backbone of AI as chips get more powerful
news.summary: Experts see opportunity in shares of infrastructure companies, some of which remain cheap. Nvidia is one of the most obvious AI plays, but there are many others.

news.title: ‘I have no mortgage’: Is it reckless to cancel my homeowner’s insurance? I can’t justify $4K a year anymore.
news.summary: “My deductible is $5,000,” she says. “I’m not going to pay $10,000.”

news.title: The real AI bubble may be in the private market
news.summary: xAI, OpenAI and Anthropic have been rapidly raising more money, adding to the notion of “aspirational” valuations across the AI startup scene.

news.title: Trump says he’ll cap credit-card interest rates at 10% as Americans battle soaring debt
news.summary: Some warn that lower interest rates could reduce credit access. Carrying credit-card debt has become increasingly expensive over the past several years, but some warn it could reduce access to credit.
